message.content:
cs.CV, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.MM, cs.IR 

The paper deals with computer vision tasks such as action and attribute classification, and leverages convolutional neural networks for feature extraction. Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition). The paper also discusses the use of deep learning techniques, which suggests that it could also belong to cs.LG (Machine Learning). Additionally, the paper involves the development of a part-based approach, which could fall under cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) or cs.MM (Multimedia). Finally, the paper discusses the evaluation of the approach using a person detection system, which could also relate to cs.IR (Information Retrieval).
